quest.name: In Too Deep
journal: Hobriaut is suffering at the hands of the taskmaster Marcette.
You agree to conduct a water survey on behalf of Hobriaut, who has been worked to the point of exhaustion by the unforgiving taskmaster Marcette. Obtain three bottles of water from Hopeseed Pond.
You have completed the water survey entrusted to the young researcher Hobriaut. Deliver the three bottles of water to him.
Though your assistance will spare Hobriaut from feeling Marcette's wrath today, the young researcher still fears for his life.
objectives: Obtain water samples from Hopeseed Pond.
Deliver the bottles of water to Hobriaut.

dialogue.name: HOBRIAUT
dialogue.text: <pant> <pant> I swear to you, that woman is a fiend! A monster! A greater danger to this realm than all the beast tribes put together, and then some! Why, I speak of Marcette, of course.

dialogue.name: HOBRIAUT
dialogue.text: No sooner did I return with the three hundred hornet stingers she requested than she sends me off to conduct a water survey at Hopeseed Pond! In my condition, I'm like to fall in face-first and drown. Oh, friend, I'm too young to die! Please say you'll help me...you must!

dialogue.name: HOBRIAUT
dialogue.text: I don't want to be Research Assistant Seven, Twelve, or Forty-three! I just want to go hoooooomeâ”€hm? Ah, praise the gods, you're back. Were you able to complete the survey?

dialogue.name: HOBRIAUT
dialogue.text: One, two, three samples from Hopeseed Pond. Wonderful! I cannot thank you enough. Though I cannot help but ponder what other backbreaking tasks might be in my future... Pluck the wisdom teeth of a goobbue? Procure a leaf from a treant's head? The gods only know.

dialogue.name: HOBRIAUT
dialogue.text: Grandfather, Grandmother...can you hear me up there? Your dear grandson shall be joining you all too soon...
